channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dog rubbish bin broken, very rusty lid., 16th September
item.description:
The dog bin at the corner of the path on Bassett rd and Gretton Road has a broken lid. It is very rusty - could be dangerous. Rest of the bin looks ok.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 16th September
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure please lift and relay x1 sunken dropped kerb above gully 900x150x20mm stats required (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet
